code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;const getAuthHeader=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}};};export const cartService={getCart:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/cart"),getAuthHeader());return response.data.items;},addToCart:async(productId,quantity)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/cart/add"),{productId,quantity},getAuthHeader());return response.data;},removeFromCart:async productId=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/cart/remove/").concat(productId),getAuthHeader());return response.data;}};
